snippet.title: Mini Countries - Release trailer
snippet.description:
Mini Countries will be released on February 12th, 2021 on Steam!

WISHLIST THE GAME NOW!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1214180/Mini_Countries

Mini Countries is a level-based strategy game where a resource transport network must be built for a country. 
Each level stands for a country that has different resources and characteristics. An ever increasing number of cities requires skill and good planning to meet the global request of resources for all cities. Upgrade cities and industries to provide better materials to your more demanding inhabitants.

Background music by Jamal Green:
https://soundcloud.com/jamalgreenmusic

Social Media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/yheekygames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/yheekygames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/yheekygames
IndieDB: https://www.indiedb.com/games/mini-countries
Discord: https://discord.gg/BwTx373

#trailer #indiegame #gamedev #indiegames
